title: why dont you care?
body:
dear riot

i have been playing league for about 3 years. spent like 1500 on it and play daily. your new client sucks. i get put in low priority queue constantly because as soon as a match starts. the game doesn't send data through the net. i am constantly checking my speed and its not my ISP or router.
im afraid to even play incase i get banned and loose all the money and time Ive put into this game.
